title: Impact of lockdown in India COVID-19
desc: The purpose of this project is to analyse and visualize Time Series data to predict the impact of COVID-19 in India. To figure out if Lockdown was quickly implemented and what will be the impact if the lockdown is withdrawn.

title: BloodCon
desc: Created a platform where interested blood donors can get in touch with people who need blood quickly and efficiently.

title: Pic-a-Tab Chrome Extension
desc: A Chrome extension which opens a new tab with random picture from unsplash

title: Terrorist Incidents Dataset (2015 - 2018)
desc: A dataset containing information about terrorist incidents occurred in between 2015 and 2018 generated from scraping Wikipedia.

title: GoalKicker-Books Script
desc: A tiny js script (nodejs) to download all ebooks from Goalkicker

title: Forumz
desc: Backend of college forum website, created for Industrial Training project in WebGuru Infosystems Pvt. Ltd..
